name: INImage
desc: Image data inside an Intents extension or Intents UI extension.

items.name: init(named: String)
items.desc: Creates an image object from an image file in the extensionâ€™s bundle.

items.name: init(uiImage: UIImage)
items.desc: Creates an image object from the specified UIKit image.

items.name: init(cgImage: CGImage)
items.desc: Creates an image object from the specified Core Graphics image.

items.name: init(imageData: Data)
items.desc: Creates an image object from the specified data.

items.name: init?(url: URL)
items.desc: Creates an image object from an image file in the local file system.

items.name: init?(url: URL, width: Double, height: Double)
items.desc: Creates an image object, of the specified size, from an image file in the local file system.

items.name: func fetchUIImage(completion: (UIImage?) -> Void)
items.desc: Fetches the image and provides it to the specified completion handler.

items.name: class func imageSize(for: INIntentResponse) -> CGSize
items.desc: Returns the preferred image size for the specified response object.

items.name: class func systemImageNamed(String) -> Self
items.desc: Returns an image object that contains the specified system symbol image.
